inkball

Class App

  • java.lang.Object
    • PApplet
      • inkball.App

  • public class App
extends PApplet
    The App class represents the main application for the Inkball game. It initializes the game board, handles user inputs, manages game states, and renders each frame of the game.

    • Method Detail

      • settings

        public void settings()
        Initialise the setting of the window size. "config.json" is the name of json file name.

      • setLeveltxtFromJson

        public void setLeveltxtFromJson()
        Load all resources such as images. Initialise the elements such as the player and map elements.

      • readLevelFile

        public void readLevelFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        Loads the level from a JSON file and initializes the gaming graph.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the JSON file containing the level data. This file should be formatted correctly to define the layout and elements of the game level.

        public void setup()
